qas.question: What is the oldest era in Egypt?
What are some examples of Ages in Egypt?
How many museums are found in Egypt?

context: Egypt has one of the oldest civilisations in the world. It has been in contact with many other civilisations and nations and has been through so many eras, starting from <a0_0>prehistoric<a0_0/> age to the modern age, passing through so many ages such as; <a1_0>Pharonic, Roman, Greek, Islamic<a1_0/> and many other ages. Because of this wide variation of ages, the continuous contact with other nations and the big number of conflicts Egypt had been through, <a2_0>at least 60<a2_0/> museums may be found in Egypt, mainly covering a wide area of these ages and conflicts.
